creditline: Gift from the Collection of John and Robyn Horn
description: bowl with vertical sides on a ring foot; wavy vertical fluting on exterior
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

on bottom, inci on bottom, incised: [Al Stirt \'89]
text: Other than the striking grain pattern of zebrawood, the only adornment of this bowl is the delicate fluting carved by Alan Stirt.
title: Bowl
